servinfo.title: DTC P0617: Starter Relay Circuit High

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0616: Starter Relay Circuit Low .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Engine starter signal is high voltage for 180 seconds continuously while engine is running.

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.
Start engine and run it at idle for 3 min. or more.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions For DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

test1.ptxt: Remove ECM from its bracket with ECM connectors connected.
Start engine, measure voltage between “C37-22” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection . If OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect starting motor control relay in fuse box No.2 with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check for proper connection to starting motor control relay at “BLK/YEL”, “BLK/RED” and “BLK” (for M/T model) wire terminals.
Measure voltage between “C37-22” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground with ignition switch turned ON.

paragroup.ptxt: “BLK/YEL” wire is shorted to power circuit.
If wires are OK, substitute a known good ECM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Measure voltage between “BLK/YEL” wire terminal for coil side of starting motor control relay connector coil side and vehicle body ground with ignition switch turned ON.

action.ptxt: Check starting motor control relay. If OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

paragroup.ptxt: Check ignition switch referring to Ignition Switch Inspection .
If ignition switch is OK, check for short circuit between ignition switch and starting motor control relay to power circuit.
